confessions.confession_text: I've been going to the wrong lecture hall for 3 weeks and the professor never noticed me. I think I'm getting a better education there.
I submitted the same essay for two different classes. Both professors gave me an A. I am the curriculum now.
The campus cat follows me home every Tuesday. I've started buying tuna for it. I think I have a pet now.
I've been 'working on my thesis' for 4 years. The thesis is one page. It is a poem. About my cat.
I pretend to understand every reference my professor makes. I have never understood a single one. I nod very convincingly.
